nexttext:
It is worth noting that the $\pi N$ component  has indeed $I=1/2$, as well as the $\eta n$ and $K^0\Lambda$ components.


The next step is to consider the final state interaction of these channels to give $K^{0}\Lambda$ at the end. This means that, to have $K^{0}\Lambda$ in the final state, we can have it by direct production in the $|H\rangle$ production, by rescattering of $K^{0}\Lambda\rightarrow K^{0}\Lambda$, or by primary production of $\pi N$ or $\eta N$ that go to $K^{0}\Lambda$ after rescattering. This is depicted in Fig.~\ref{Fig3} and analytically this is taken into account by means of
mathml:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E1.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="|H\rangle=\pi^{-}p-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\pi^{0}n+\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\eta n+\sqrt{%
\frac{2}{3}}K^{0}\Lambda." display="block"><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo fence="true" stretchy="false">|</mo><mi>H</mi><mo stretchy="false">⟩</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mrow><mrow><msup><mi>π</mi><mo>-</mo></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mi>p</mi></mrow><mo>-</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>π</mi><mn>0</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>⁢</mo><mi>η</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><msqrt><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>K</mi><mn>0</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>.</mo></mrow></math>

prevtext:
It is worth noting that the $\pi N$ component  has indeed $I=1/2$, as well as the $\eta n$ and $K^0\Lambda$ components.


The next step is to consider the final state interaction of these channels to give $K^{0}\Lambda$ at the end. This means that, to have $K^{0}\Lambda$ in the final state, we can have it by direct production in the $|H\rangle$ production, by rescattering of $K^{0}\Lambda\rightarrow K^{0}\Lambda$, or by primary production of $\pi N$ or $\eta N$ that go to $K^{0}\Lambda$ after rescattering. This is depicted in Fig.~\ref{Fig3} and analytically this is taken into account by means of

mathml:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E5.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\frac{d^{2}\Gamma}{dM_{J/\psi\Lambda}^{2}dM_{K^{0}\Lambda}^{2}}=\frac{1}{(2\pi%
)^{3}}\frac{4M_{\Lambda_{b}}M_{\Lambda}}{32M_{\Lambda_{b}}^{3}}\bar{\sum}\sum|%
\mathcal{M}(M_{J/\psi\Lambda},M_{K^{0}\Lambda})|^{2}," display="block"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Γ</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msubsup><mi>M</mi><mrow><mrow><mi>J</mi><mo>/</mo><mi>ψ</mi></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>⁢</mo><mi>d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msubsup><mi>M</mi><mrow><msup><mi>K</mi><mn>0</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mi>π</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>⁢</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>M</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi><mi>b</mi></msub></msub><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>32</mn><mo>⁢</mo><msubsup><mi>M</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi><mi>b</mi></msub><mn>3</mn></msubsup></mrow></mfrac><mo>⁢</mo><mover accent="true"><mo largeop="true" movablelimits="false" symmetric="true">∑</mo><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo largeop="true" movablelimits="false" symmetric="true">∑</mo><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">|</mo><mrow><mi class="ltx_font_mathcaligraphic">ℳ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>M</mi><mrow><mrow><mi>J</mi><mo>/</mo><mi>ψ</mi></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><msub><mi>M</mi><mrow><msup><mi>K</mi><mn>0</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo></mrow></math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E6.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="T_{N^{*}(1895)}=\frac{\alpha M_{N^{*}(1895)}}{M_{K\Lambda}-M_{N^{*}(1895)}+i%
\Gamma_{N^{*}(1895)}/2}" display="block"><mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mrow><msup><mi>N</mi><mo>*</mo></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1895</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>M</mi><mrow><msup><mi>N</mi><mo>*</mo></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1895</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mrow><msub><mi>M</mi><mrow><mi>K</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi></mrow></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>M</mi><mrow><msup><mi>N</mi><mo>*</mo></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1895</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Γ</mi><mrow><msup><mi>N</mi><mo>*</mo></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1895</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>/</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E7.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="|\mathcal{M}|^{2}\rightarrow|\mathcal{M}|^{2}+\beta\tilde{P_{K}}^{2}\left|%
\frac{1}{M_{K\Lambda}-M_{N^{*}(1900)}+i\Gamma_{N^{*}(1900)}/2}\right|^{2}," display="block"><mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">|</mo><mi class="ltx_font_mathcaligraphic">ℳ</mi><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>→</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">|</mo><mi class="ltx_font_mathcaligraphic">ℳ</mi><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mrow><mi>β</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mover accent="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mi>K</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">~</mo></mover><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mrow><msub><mi>M</mi><mrow><mi>K</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Λ</mi></mrow></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>M</mi><mrow><msup><mi>N</mi><mo>*</mo></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1900</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Γ</mi><mrow><msup><mi>N</mi><mo>*</mo></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1900</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>/</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo></mrow></math>
